overview: Naren a young boy from a fisherman family of Sundarban. He is very curious about fishing at jungle. One day Naren manage to go to the forest with his father. At night when everyone is busy for fishing, tiger attacked his father and move into the jungle. Everyone follow the tiger to catch body. Naren run with them and lost into the forest. He is rescued by a young girl from tiger attack and safely take Naren to her jungle tree house area. Naren comes to know her name is Jhinuk. She is the only daughter of forest dacoit Rahaman. N
title: Sundarboner Goppo
